name: Oreo® No-Bake Cookies
author: Brit Parritt
summary: I really love Oreo® cookies and no-bake cookies so mixing the two together makes them both even better! Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: ¾ cup butter, cut into pieces
1 cup crushed chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®)
1 (4 ounce) package cookies and cream instant pudding mix (such as Jell-O® Oreo®)
directions: Combine sugar, butter, and milk in a large saucepan over medium heat; bring to a boil
Cook and stir until butter has melted and sugar has dissolved a bit, about 2 minutes
Turn off heat and stir in oats, crushed cookies, pudding mix, and vanilla extract
Drop spoonfuls of batter 2 inches apart onto waxed paper
Let cool until set, about 30 minutes
